contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{ESC National Year | Year = 1957 | Country = Germany | Preselection = National Final | Preselection date = 17 February 1957 | Entrant = [[Margot Hielscher]] | Song = [[Telefon, Telefon]] | Final result = 4th, 8 points }} '''Germany''' held a national final to select the song that would represent Germany at the '''Eurovision Song Contest 1957'''. The winner was [[Margot Hielscher]] with the song "[[Telefon, Telefon]]". ==National final== The German national final was held on 17 February at the [[Großer Sendesaal des HR]] in [[Frankfurt]], hosted by [[Hans-Joachim Kulenkampff]]. {|class="wikitable" !Draw !! Artist || Song || Points || Place |- | 1 || [[Renée Franke]] || Ich Brauche Dein Herz || 18 || 2nd |- | 2 || [[Illo Schieder]] || Was Machen Die Mädchen In Rio || 9 || 4th |- | 3 || Paul Kuhn || Das Klavier Über Mir || 17 || 3rd |-bgcolor="gold" | '''4''' || '''[[Margot Hielscher]]''' || '''[[Telefon, Telefon]]''' || '''36''' || '''1st''' |- |} ==At Eurovision== Germany was the host country of the [[Eurovision Song Contest 1957]], held in [[Frankfurt]]. Hielscher performed 7th on the night of the contest, following the [[Netherlands]] and preceding [[France]]. The song received eight points, placing 4th. ===Voting=== <small>Every country had a jury of ten people. Every jury member could give one point to his or her favourite song.</small> {{Col-begin}} {{Col-2}} ====Points given==== *6 points to [[France in the Eurovision Song Contest 1957|France]] *2 points to [[Belgium in the Eurovision Song Contest 1957|Belgium]] *1 point to the [[Netherlands in the Eurovision Song Contest 1957|Netherlands]] *1 point to [[Switzerland in the Eurovision Song Contest 1957|Switzerland]] {{Col-2}} ====Points received==== *6 points from [[France in the Eurovision Song Contest 1957|France]] *1 point from [[Belgium in the Eurovision Song Contest 1957|Belgium]] *1 point from [[Italy in the Eurovision Song Contest 1957|Italy]] {{Col-end}} {{Germany in Eurovision}} {{Eurovision Song Contest 1957}} [[Category:Germany in the Eurovision Song Contest]] [[Category:1957 in Germany]] [[Category:Countries in the Eurovision Song Contest 1957]]
